messages.message:
Seems like the file-size limits have been tightened. Previously I was able to upload long legal documents (100+ pgs).  Now, it seems as though there is a limit around 50 pages.  Is this permanent?  Is there a way around this?  It used to be a major differentiator that we had no page limits.

When we change or add limitations to the app, can we please get those captured in release notes?  Even if the notes are internal, *it is critical that we get into the habit of creating detailed documentation and change logs* (could even be bullet points like we get in iphone app updates).

cc. @Léo
I don't think we put any new restrictions? Did the app stop you from uploading? What was the error / warning message you see

All MSFT OCR pods looks healthy, not seeing any issues there. Looking at OCR Service. I am able to reproduce this error with @Léo file.
@Dan H - are you able to share the document you are seeing error with ? I tried some 150 and 200 page documents and they were processed.
So just to clarify, this is not related to any new restrictions, this is just OCR timing out. We didn't change any restrictions
Its timing out on specific pages here for this doc - needs more investigation.
